scripts.dev: concurrently "pnpm --filter frontend dev" "cd packages/backend && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload"
scripts.dev:backend: cd packages/backend && poetry run uvicorn main:app --reload
scripts.lint: pnpm --filter frontend lint && cd packages/backend && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.lint:fix: pnpm --filter frontend lint --fix && cd packages/backend && poetry run ruff check --fix . && poetry run black .
scripts.test: pnpm --filter frontend test && cd packages/backend && poetry run pytest
